attributes.action: Dissolve parliament, and call a General Election
attributes.additional_details:
Following the action taken under government direction following the Southport tragedy, there is zero confidence to be had in the current Labour government.  They have let down our elderly, our farmers, our businesses, and our children.  Our borders are a free-for-all, and our tolerance is being abused and taken for weakness. 
We are tired, and we have had enough.  We want a Government which we CAN trust.
attributes.background: Despite the fact that a previous petition regarding a general election has been run, I would like to request on behalf of all who sign that Keir Starmer dissolve parliament and call a new election, with manifestos based in truth and promises which will be kept, by all parties who make them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call a General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
